name: Attegg!
description:
Attegg! - An Eierpecken Simulator

Eierpecken is an Easter tradition here in Austria. Two competitors smash painted eggs together. The victor receives the loser's broken egg. Victory mainly depends on the angle of attack and where you manage to hit the other person's egg. This game tries to faithfully replicate the complicated tactics of Eierpecken.

This is a local two-player game, currently for desktop browsers only. The mobile version does not work correctly yet.

Controls:

  • Key A or tap on left egg: left player attack
  • Key L or tap on right egg: right player attack

Created using the Godot game engine. I made this game in 2 days during the Easter weekend of 2023. This is the first of my Godot projects that can actually be considered a somewhat finished game. ;-) 

Graphics scribbled in Krita. Music composed in LMMS by Dorota Krzywicka-Kaindel.
